name: A Game about Fried Eggs
description:
Try to put fried eggs on

a plate,
a hotdog,
a fish,
a tornado,
a fairy,
and
Antartica.

But please be careful.
Some would blow it away,
and 
some hate bursted yolks.

* This build is a showcase of mobile version. If you liked this game, you can download this game on Google Play store free.
